VRDisplayRequestAnimationFrame.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The requestAnimationFrame() method of the interface is a special implementation of containing a callback function that will be called every time a new frame of the VRDisplay presentation is rendered:

blockquote.para: This method was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRDisplayRequestAnimationFrame.returns: A long representing the handle of the requestAnimationFrame() call. This can then be passed to a call to unregister the callback.
